description: As you enter this restaurant, you’re struck by the sight of hundreds of bottles of wine lining the walls. First and foremost a wine bar, Innocenti Wine Experiences is transformed into a restaurant for lunch and dinner, serving creative cuisine which focuses mainly on meat dishes with the occasional elaborate and original twist. There’s obviously no problem choosing your wine – just look around you!
